version_description:
1.3.0.f424
New Deathmatch Map: HEAT!
New Weapon: VECTOR!
New Melee weapon: Tactical Axe!
Improved User Interface
Practice Mode vs Bots
Added free default emblems for The Breach and Coalition
Fixed a few gameplay crashes

1.3.0.f433
New Deathmatch Map: HEAT!
New Weapon: VECTOR!
New Melee weapon: Tactical Axe!
Improved User Interface

Practice Mode vs Bots

Added free default emblems for The Breach and Coalition

Fixed a few gameplay crashes

1.4.0.f458
Extended Custom Games - You can now customize the custom games more!
Added Gyro support
Player names are now visible again during the match
Player ranks no longer show in the ranked loading screens

Fixes:
"HEAT" map related issues
Ranked sometimes started as 4v5
Clan leader did not have leader icon
Players sometimes disappeared from the scoreboard at the end of the match
Practice grenade was visible in the loadout

1.4.0.f470
Extended Custom Games - You can now customize the custom games more!
Added Gyro support
Player names are now visible again during the match
Player ranks no longer show in the ranked loading screens

Fixes:
"HEAT" map related issues
Ranked sometimes started as 4v5
Clan leader did not have leader icon
Players sometimes disappeared from the scoreboard at the end of the match
Practice grenade was visible in the loadout

1.4.0.f488
Extended Custom Games - You can now customize the custom games more!
Added Gyro support
Player names are now visible again during the match
Player ranks no longer show in the ranked loading screens

Fixes:
"HEAT" map related issues
Ranked sometimes started as 4v5
Clan leader did not have leader icon
Players sometimes disappeared from the scoreboard at the end of the match
Practice grenade was visible in the loadout

1.4.1.f526
Fixed bomb has been planted kept playing when the bomb was not planted
Gameplay server updates

1.5.0.f532
Added Weekly Challenges
Auto claim Critical Pass rewards after a season has ended
Added Packet Loss indicator
Anti-cheat improvements

Plaza Optimization
Memory optimization

FIXED Duplicate bomb in Defuse
FIXED the bomb is planted on A the bomb is planted on A the bomb is planted on A
FIXED Mission boosting not working sometimes and not seeing credits quickly after the store ad finishing

1.5.0.f550
Added Weekly Challenges
Auto claim Critical Pass rewards after a season has ended
Added Packet Loss indicator
Anti-cheat improvements
Plaza Optimization
Memory optimization

FIXED Duplicate bomb in Defuse
FIXED the bomb is planted on A the bomb is planted on A the bomb is planted on A
FIXED Mission boosting not working sometimes and not seeing credits quickly after the store ad finishing

1.6.0.f574
Ranked Seasons!
- New Rank, Elite Ops
- Rank reset
- Matchmaking improvements

Player Levels!
- Gather XP to increase your Player Level

New Weapon: M1887
Weapon Updates

FIXED wrong knife sound for different knife models
FIXED various crashes
IMPROVED practice mode loading times

1.7.0.f610
New Map GALLERY
- Available in TDM and Gun Game
- ADDED Player Level Icons for extra flair as you level up
- Limited time offers are now easier to find
- PLAZA performance improvements
- FIXED various crashes

1.8.0.f742
SUMMER '89 event is here! #retro
• 12 totally new weapon skins
• Most popular weapon skins from last year

NEW WEAPON: SVD sniper rifle
NEW GAME MODE: Sharpshooter
• Limited time snipers only team deathmatch
• Park map for Sharpshooter

• Added a setting for disabling shoot button from affecting aiming
• Improved XP screen responsiveness
• Party chat improvements
• Clan & Friends menu improvements
• FIXED various crashes

1.9.0.f794
• NEW Karambit skin REVOLUTION available NOW!
• PARK map is now available in Custom Games
• Removed option to replace the existing account with a new account when linking an account
• Various fixes and improvements

1.10.0.f815
- NEW DEFUSE MAP: PORT!
- NEW WEAPON: MPX!
- NEW FEATURE: unlock and equip new cool reload and inspect CUSTOM ANIMATIONS for weapons!
- IMPROVED Legacy map with new visuals and gameplay improvements
- ADDED option to customize minimap and pause button location in HUD
- ADDED milestones for SVD and MPX
- Various fixes and improvements

1.11.0.f891
RANKED SEASON 2 is coming
- INTRODUCED: Divisions to Ranks from Bronze to Master
- INTRODUCED: Bonus kill rewards in DEFUSE for SMG, Shotgun and Knife kills

1.13.0.f959
- NEW WEAPON: Deagle
- NEW KNIFE: Balisong'
- Various fixes and improvements

WINTERFEST 2019 event is here!
- Get exclusive new content!
- NEW EVENT GAME MODE: Triple Threat
- NEW MAP: Arctic for Triple Threat mode
- Various fixes and improvements

WINTERFEST 2019 event is here!
- Get exclusive new content!
- NEW EVENT GAME MODE: Triple Threat
- NEW MAP: Arctic for Triple Threat mode
- Various fixes and improvements

1.14.0.f998
NEW EVENTS: Critical Pass Season 12 and Operation Warpaint available SOON!
NEW MAP: CARGO has been added to Deathmatch and Gun Game
NEW DEAGLE SKINS: Introduced 15 Deagle skins to Standard and Premium case
ARCTIC and PURIFY maps available in Custom Games
IMPROVEMENTS:
- Fixed a bug with spawn timer
Added status information for Connect and Disconnect screens

1.14.0.f998
NEW EVENTS: Critical Pass Season 12 and Operation Warpaint available SOON!
NEW MAP: CARGO has been added to Deathmatch and Gun Game
NEW DEAGLE SKINS: Introduced 15 Deagle skins to Standard and Premium case
ARCTIC and PURIFY maps available in Custom Games
IMPROVEMENTS:
- Fixed a bug with spawn timer
Added status information for Connect and Disconnect screens

1.15.0.f1038
NEW FEATURE: VICTORY SCREEN - New phase introduced to the post match flow. Win a game and get a chance to show off.
NEW FEATURE: INBOX - Players can receive important updates, messages and giveaways straight to their in-game inbox
Quality of life improvements:
New settings for weapon quick swapping and custom room hosting options
Improved in-game settings menu and drop weapon icons
Improved store layout
NEW EVENT: Critical Pass 13 and a new event coming soon!

Improved bullet tracers
